class:
A received message.
A delivery attempt can fail. As a result, a particular message may correspond to multiple deliveries.
Delivery guarantees Conceptual overview Transfer performative
The receiver on which the delivery was received.
Change the delivery state to ACCEPTED.
If the receiver.delivery-mode is AT-MOST-ONCE or AT-LEAST-ONCE, this call will also settle the delivery.
Change the delivery state to REJECTED.
If the receiver.delivery-mode is AT-MOST-ONCE or AT-LEAST-ONCE, this call will also settle the delivery.
Change the delivery state to RELEASED.
If the receiver.delivery-mode is AT-MOST-ONCE or AT-LEAST-ONCE, this call will also settle the delivery.
Change the delivery state to MODIFIED.
If the receiver.delivery-mode is AT-MOST-ONCE or AT-LEAST-ONCE, this call will also settle the delivery.
